name: Alexx A-Game
introduction: Alex Gallimore more Popularly known as Alexx A-Game, born in St Ann, Jamaica is a dynamic and multi-talented artiste. Through his versatility, infectious energy and captivating presence, Alexx A-Game has made a name for himself in the music industry and is making his way into film with the completion of his first major role as "Peter Tosh" in the highly anticipated "Bob Marley - One Love" movie.
